titles.title: National Commission on Employment and Economic Security Act
To establish a commission to study employment and economic insecurity in the United States workforce.

bill.summary: 12/4/2013--Introduced. National Commission on Employment and Economic Security Act - Establishes the National Commission on Employment and Economic Security to: (1) examine the effects of economic and psychological insecurity caused by employment displacement and the decreasing number of well-paid jobs on U.S. workers and their families; and (2) recommend to the President and Congress potential solutions, including legislative and administrative action, to alleviate such problems.
